sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_b88c0c3be033300029a6fccbaa5d48ff
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_page"><sys_ui_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>general</category><client_script/><description>A page to used to request a new session from a Bomgar Appliance, based upon a Session Key</description><html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">

<g:evaluate>
var hostname = gs.getProperty( 'tu.bomgar.hostname', 'teamultra.bomgar.com' );
 var url = 'https://' + hostname + '/api/start_session.ns';


</g:evaluate>

<br/>
<div class="contentBox" id="sessionKeyBox">

<table style="padding-left:2px" class="wide" cellspacing="0">
<tr class="header">
  <td class="column_head" align="left">Bomgar Session request - Session Key</td>
</tr>
</table>

<p>You can use this form to initiate a Bomgar session when you have been given a Session key from a Support Representative.</p>
<br/>

<div>
<form action="${url}" method="post">

<table>
<tr>
<td title="Please enter the Bomgar Session Key" data-type="label" noWrap="true" class="label label_spacing">
    <span id="status.session.key" class=" label_description" title="" mandatory="false" oclass=""></span>
    <label id="access_key_pretty:label" for="access_key_pretty" class="accessible">Session key:</label>
  </td>
  <td class="input_controls">
    <input type="text" name="short_key" id="short_key" value="" size="12" maxlength="24" autocomplete="off" />
  </td>
</tr>

<tr>
  <td/>
  <td>
    <button type="submit">Submit Session Key</button>
  </td>
</tr>
</table>


</form>

</div>
</div>

</j:jelly>
</html><name>bomgar_request_session</name><processing_script/><sys_created_by>team.ultra</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-03-05 15:01:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>b88c0c3be033300029a6fccbaa5d48ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>team.ultra</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-03-05 15:01:21</sys_updated_on></sys_ui_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_d9b0d47be033300029a6fccbaa5d48f3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_macro"><sys_ui_macro action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><category>general</category><description>show bomgar jump client popup link
activate by:
- set the active field in this macro to true
- adding the attribute to a dictionary field: ref_contributions=tu_bg_jump_to_ci</description><media_type/><name>tu_bg_jump_to_ci</name><sys_created_by>team.ultra</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-03-05 15:20:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>d9b0d47be033300029a6fccbaa5d48f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>team.ultra</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-03-05 15:20:39</sys_updated_on><xml><?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:evaluate var="jvar_guid" expression="gs.generateGUID(this);" />
<j:set var="jvar_n" value="tu_bg_jump_${jvar_guid}:${ref}"/>
<g:reference_decoration id="${jvar_n}" field="${ref}" 
  onclick="tubgJump('${ref}'); "
  title="${gs.getMessage('Bomgar Jump')}" image="bomgar_small.pngx"/>

<script>
// show related list 
// todo: should be part of the PopupWindow class
// todo: needs new stack name
function tubgJump(reference) {

  var s = reference.split('.');
  var tableName = s[0];
  var referenceField = s[1];
  var fieldElement = 'sys_display.' + tableName + '.' + referenceField; 

  var task_no = g_form.getValue('number');
  var cmdb_ci = gel(fieldElement).value;

  var amp = '&amp;amp;', url;

  url = 'https://teamultra.bomgar.com/api/client_script.ns?';
  url += 'type=rep';
  url += amp + 'operation=generate';
  url += amp + 'action=start_pinned_client_session';
  url += amp + 'search_string=' + cmdb_ci;
  url += amp + 'session.custom.external_key=' + task_no;

  var w = getTopWindow(); 
  w.popupOpenFocus(url, 'related_list',  950, 700, '', false, false); 
}

</script>
</j:jelly> 
</xml></sys_ui_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_430ac83be033300029a6fccbaa5d482e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><application/><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_tu_bg_session</collection><condition>current.u_duration.changes()</condition><description/><name>Update Duration Band</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><script>update_duration_band();

function update_duration_band() {

   var dura, durs = 0, dur_band = '00';
   dura = current.u_duration.split(':');
   durs = parseInt(dura[0], 10) * 3600;
   durs += parseInt(dura[1], 10) * 60;
   durs += parseInt(dura[2], 10);

   if ( durs < 60 ) {
	  dur_band = '00';
   } else if ( durs < 300 ) {
	  dur_band = '10';
   } else if ( durs < 600 ) {
	  dur_band = '20';
   } else if ( durs < 1800 ) {
	  dur_band = '30';
   } else if ( durs < 3600 ) {
	  dur_band = '40';
   } else {
	  dur_band = '50';
   }

   current.u_duration_band = dur_band;
   
}
</script><sys_created_by>team.ultra</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-03-05 14:50:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>430ac83be033300029a6fccbaa5d482e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_overrides/><sys_updated_by>team.ultra</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-03-05 14:50:56</sys_updated_on><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
